title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
The Grand Duke Type Companion Quest Act Act 1 Companion Wyll Reward Rescue the Grand Duke:The Sparky PointsThe JoltshooterThe Spellsparkler

The Grand Duke is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The Grand Duke is a part of The Blade of Frontiers Companion Quest. The Grand Duke can be acquired from as you progress with Wyll and hear about the Grand Duke's whereabouts in Act 1. This quest aligns with the objectives received in Rescue the Grand Duke.
